comment: Prediction Poll With weeks before the Election, bombs were sent so far to Soros, Obama, Clinton and CNN. Who is behind all of this? Place your bets!
amr:
# ::snt Prediction Poll With weeks before the Election, bombs were sent so far to Soros, Obama, Clinton and CNN. Who is behind all of this? Place your bets!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / send-01
            :ARG1 (b / bomb)
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Soros"))
                  :op2 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Obama"))
                  :op3 (p3 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Clinton"))
                  :op4 (p4 / publication
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "CNN")))
            :time (b2 / before
                  :op1 (e / elect-01)
                  :quant (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (w / week))))
            :time (p5 / poll-01
                  :ARG2 (p6 / predict-01)))
      :snt2 (a2 / amr-unknown
            :ARG0-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (t2 / this
                        :mod (a3 / all))))
      :snt3 (p7 / place-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (b3 / bet-01
                  :ARG0 y)))
